answers.answer: Your doctor should tell you if you have diabetes, but my understanding is that low blood sugar does not indicate gestational diabetes but I could be wrong. For my one-hour test my level was really high so I has to do the 3-hour test but those results came back normal.
Yes...its called hypoglycemic! I get the shakes,light headed, heartbeating fast and sweats. Its not healthy in pregnancy just like diabetes

question: Any of you diabetic?  I was wondering what the symptoms are if any, I'm 26 weeks and just took my glucose test.. result came back..I'm a little low but unsure if that's a form of diabetes aswell.
title: pregnancy diabetes
